name: The 5th Asia-Pacific Conference on Engineering and Applied Sciences
content: The 5th Asia-Pacific Conference on Engineering and Applied Sciences (APCEAS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Engineering, Applied Science and more. 2018 APCEAS will take place from December 18-20, 2018 in Sydney, Australia. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. Full paper and abstract both are welcomed to submit. Topics are listed but are not restricted to the followings: Applied Science, Engineering and all sub-fields. All abstracts/papers should conform to the required format and be uploaded on the website. Upon the registration payment, the presentation of one accepted submission will be confirmed. Topics:  Power & Energy Engineering  Fundamental and Applied Sciences  Civil Engineering  Computer Engineering and Technology  Electrical and Electronic Engineering  Environmental Engineering  Information Engineering and Technology  Material Science and Engineering  Mechanical Engineering and Technology  Aeronautics & Aerospace Engineering  Biological Engineering  Chemical Engineering More sub-fields please visit http://www.apceas.org/site/page.aspx?pid=126&sid=6034&lang=en Our website: www.apceas.org
